file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-96-02-04 - MAGNETIC DRAIN PLUG - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAGNETIC DRAIN PLUG - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the magnetic drain plug. B. The magnetic drain plug is installed at the bottom of the reduction drive assembly oil sump. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-96-02-000-801-A MAGNETIC DRAIN PLUG - REMOVAL T-62T-40C14 AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-96-02-400-801-A MAGNETIC DRAIN PLUG - INSTALLATION T-62T-40C14 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-96-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-96-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 2. MAGNETIC DRAIN PLUG - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand engine manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-93-05. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM 06-42-01/101 - AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313CL APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-96-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the APU cowling access panel 313CL (AMM 06-42-01/101). (4) Put a container below the reduction drive assembly to catch oil. J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the magnetic drain plug. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand engine manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-93-05. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-96-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-96-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 3. MAGNETIC DRAIN PLUG - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand engine manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-93-05. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM 06-42-01/101 - AMM TASK 49-13-00-910-802-A/200 APU - START C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313CL APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the magnetic drain plug. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand engine manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-93-05. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the container from reduction drive assembly. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-96-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. (3) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. (4) Operate the APU ( AMM TASK 49-13-00-910-802-A/200) and examine the reduction drive assembly for oil leaks. (5) Install the APU cowling access panel 313CL (AMM 06-42-01/101). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-96-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
